scenario.name: A Party
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:UserB@abc.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Route: [$2] From: sip:UserA@abc.com;tag=[pid]SIPpTag02[call_number] To: sip:UserB@abc.com Call-ID: 2000///[call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Supported: outbound,replaces,199,100rel P-Early-Media: supported Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE,PRACK,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,UPDATE,PUBLISH,SUBSCRIBE P-Asserted-Identity: sip:UserA@abc.com User-Agent: sipp Request-Disposition: no-fork Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=ccs-0-275-1 111111 555555 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] b=AS:80 b=RS:1000 b=RR:3000 t=0 0 m=audio 11068 RTP/AVP 96 97 a=sendrecv a=rtpmap:96 AMR/8000 a=rtpmap:97 AMR-WB/16000
ACK [$4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Route:[$3] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
BYE [$4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Route:[$3] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
